palmadulu rajamaha wiharaye aadhipathyaya daru swamindrayan wahansela pas namak ma sabaragamu maha padawiya ha shripada padawiya dara athi athara, mahanuwara malwathu maha wihara karaka sangha sabhawa wisin mema aithihasika sabaragamu maha padawiya hewath sabaragamu palathe pradhana sangha nayaka padawiya 1970 di haldanduwana dhammarakkhitha maha swamindrayan wahanse wetha pirinama atha. 1981 sapthambar masa 03 wana dina apawath wi wadala unwahanse ge guna samara 2019 sapthambar 03 wana da sangasathu maha danayak pirinamimata palmadulu rajamaha wiharaya, karangoda pothgul rajamaha wiharaya yana ubhaya wiharadhipathi, uuwa wellassa wishwa widyalaye kulapathi, gauthama shri padasthanadhipathi, rathnapura maha disawe pradhana sangha nayaka dharma kirthi shri sumangala rathanapala bengamuwe shri dhammadinna swamindrayan wahanse katayuthu yoda thibini.
